body_html:
In this case, is there a reason to declare the confusion matrix as a
TF tensor?

On Wednesday, January 13, 2016, Derek Murray notifications@github.com
wrote:

I answered a related question on StackOverflow (which could generalize to
your setting):

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/34685947/adjust-single-value-within-tensor-tensorflow/34686952#34686952

Can you take a look and see if it helps?

—

body:
In this case, is there a reason to declare the confusion matrix as a
TF tensor?

On Wednesday, January 13, 2016, Derek Murray notifications@github.com
wrote:

> I answered a related question on StackOverflow (which could generalize to
> your setting):
> 
> http://stackoverflow.com/questions/34685947/adjust-single-value-within-tensor-tensorflow/34686952#34686952
> 
> Can you take a look and see if it helps?
